title: Coordinate Apartment Unit Turnover
description: After a tenant moves out, a property manager must coordinate the 'turnover' process to get the unit ready for the next tenant.

tasks.description: After the move-out inspection, create a scope of work for the turnover, including painting, cleaning, and any necessary repairs.
tasks.expected_outcome: A detailed turnover checklist is created.

tasks.description: Schedule multiple vendors (painter, cleaner, handyman) to complete the work in the correct sequence.
tasks.expected_outcome: All vendors are scheduled efficiently to minimize vacancy time.

tasks.description: Conduct a final 'rent-ready' inspection to ensure all work has been completed to standard before marketing the unit.
tasks.expected_outcome: The unit is confirmed to be in rent-ready condition.
